definitions.text: a person who has achieved distinction and honor in some field
examples: he is one of the greats of American music

definitions.text: relatively large in size or number or extent; larger than others of its kind

examples: Einstein was one of the outstanding figures of the 20th centurey

definitions.text: remarkable or out of the ordinary in degree or magnitude or effect
examples: had a great stake in the outcome
had a great time at the party
many medieval manuscripts are in majuscule script

definitions.text: in an advanced stage of pregnancy
